sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private userService:UserService){} username:string = "" password:string = "" message:string = "" login(){ this.userService.login(this.username, this.password).subscribe( (user)=>{ if(user == null){ this.message = "Korisnik ne postoji!" return; }else{ localStorage.setItem("user", JSON.stringify(user)); } } ) } } Mentor Bootstrap Template - Index
